pr_title: Treatment SQL performs well on multi-study queries

timeline.bodyText: might be cleaner if the unique/distinct step can be done in mysql in some way. Looks slightly odd when studyIds are given as argument twice imo, though not a big deal
timeline.author: inodb

timeline.message:

- Filter cancer study before filtering by study, sample id pairs
